name: Zoixl
description:
It is a low dimensional game based on points, especially made for non-internet environments.

I wanted to develop the game more, but the more features I add to the project, the more complex the project gets, which means it takes me longer to develop the game. It gets stuck because I have very little time to devote to developing the game. That's why I am presenting it to you as it is for now, if I have time in the future, I will add new features and change the images.

I would not recommend you to play the game for more than 5 minutes because the game is really boring :).

This game is made for the developer to improve himself.

Images and Gameplay near may change in the future.

made by Efe Umut Günen
